messages.subject: Re: Been Thinking & wallpaper
messages.messageBody:
<<Punch holes and put them in a three ring notebook. You can double print if
it
covers two topics. At least the move would be smoother! <g> Then you could
hang them all over the house when you're settled! Unschooling wallpaper!>>


Thanks Kelly, now I know what to do will all those 3 ring notebooks I have
that I was just about to toss. Cool. I really like that idea about the
unschooling wallpaper though, seriously, I think it would be different and unusual,
sort of like me! LOL I really think I'm going to figure out a way to take all the
tips and quotes and make some type of wallpaper out of them for one of the
rooms in our house.

Kim
